# pipelineDataSetSerializer

**Instance Property**

Returns the pipeline data set serializer into which this compiler stores data for all pipelines it creates.

## Declaration

```swift
var pipelineDataSetSerializer: (any MTL4PipelineDataSetSerializer)? { get }
```
